pages.text: $(item)Wither Ash$() is a new type of placeable dust. Made from the essense of $(thing)Wither Skeletons$(), any blocks you coat with this will never spawn any hostile mobs.$(br2)Additionally, if $(item)Wither Ash$() is placed $(italic)below$() a block, that block will also become mob-proof.

pages.title: Demonstration
pages.text: Both of these situations prevent monsters from spawning.
